abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of contemporary music pieces, including premieres by Michael Gilbertson, Juraj Filas and Robert Paterson, performed by Musica Sacra choir at Cathedral Church of St John the Divine.
lead_paragraph: At the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine, this mainstay of the New York choral scene premiered three pieces.

headline.main: Review: Musica Sacra Highlights Living Composers

snippet: At the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine, this mainstay of the New York choral scene premiered three pieces.
